body_html: Thank you, I'll definitely look into TCMalloc for future memory monitoring. In the meantime I am satisfied that the original problem I saw was the fault my implementation and has (regardless of viewing) been resolved by the change recommended by @ibab. I don't seem to have permission to close this Issue but you are welcome to do so. Thank you for the help.

body: Thank you, I'll definitely look into TCMalloc for future memory monitoring.  In the meantime I am satisfied that the original problem I saw was the fault my implementation and has (regardless of viewing) been resolved by the change recommended by @ibab.  I don't seem to have permission to close this Issue but you are welcome to do so.  Thank you for the help.
